Ardent Sacrifice.effect: Restores 10 HP to target ally. Unit loses 10 HP but cannot go below 1.

Dance.effect: Grants another action to target ally. (Cannot target an ally with Sing or Dance.)

Draw Back.effect: Unit moves 1 space away from target ally. Ally moves to unit’s previous space.

Harsh Command.effect: Converts penalties on target into bonuses.

Martyr.effect: Restores HP 7+ this unit's suffered damage. Unit Heals HP=half suffered damage. Slows Special trigger (cooldown count +1).

Martyr+.effect: Restores HP = this unit's suffered damage +50% of Atk. (Minimum of 7 HP.) Also restores HP to unit = half suffered damage.

Physic.effect: Restores 8 HP to target ally. Range = 2.

Physic+.effect: Restores HP = 50% of Atk. (Minimum of 8 HP.) Range = 2.

Pivot.effect: Unit moves to opposite side of target ally.

Rally Attack.effect: Grants Atk+4 to target ally for 1 turn.

Rally Atk/Def.effect: Grants Atk/Def+3 to target ally for 1 turn.

Rally Atk/Res.effect: Grants Atk/Res+3 to target ally for 1 turn.

Rally Atk/Spd.effect: Grants Atk/Spd+3 to target ally for 1 turn.

Rally Defense.effect: Grants Def+4 to target ally for 1 turn.

Rally Def/Res.effect: Grants Def/Res+3 to target ally for 1 turn.

Rally Resistance.effect: Grants Res+4 to target ally for 1 turn.

Rally Spd/Def.effect: Grants Spd/Def+3 to target ally for 1 turn.

Rally Spd/Res.effect: Grants Spd/Res+3 to target ally for 1 turn.

Rally Speed.effect: Grants Spd+4 to target ally for 1 turn.

Reciprocal Aid.effect: Unit and target ally swap HP. (Neither can go above their max HP.)

Reconcile.effect: Restores 7 HP to unit and target ally.

Recover.effect: Slows Special trigger (cooldown count+1). Restores 15 HP to target ally.

Recover+.effect: Restores HP = 50% of Atk +10. (Minimum of 15 HP.)

Rehabilitate.effect: Slows Special trigger (cooldown count+1). If target's HP is ≤ 50%, the lower the target's HP, the more HP is restored. (Minimum of 7 HP.)

Rehabilitate+.effect: Restores HP = 50% of Atk -10. (Minimum of 7 HP.) If target's HP is ≤ 50%, the lower the target's HP, the more HP is restored.

Reposition.effect: Target ally moves to opposite side of unit.

Restore.effect: Restores 8 HP. Neutralizes ally's penalties (from skills like Panic, Threaten, etc.) and negative status effects (preventing counterattacks, restricting movement, etc.) that last through ally's next action.

Restore+.effect: Restores HP = 50% of Atk. (Minimum of 8 HP.) Neutralizes ally's penalties (from skills like Panic, Threaten, etc.) and negative status effects (preventing counterattacks, restricting movement, etc.) that last through ally's next action.

Sacrifice.effect: Converts penalties on target into bonuses. Restores target's HP = unit's current HP -1. Unit's HP reduced by amount restored.

Sing.effect: Grants another action to target ally. (Cannot target an ally with Sing or Dance.)

Swap.effect: Unit and target ally swap spaces.
